body_html:
Hi,
I guess you have to choose either of the following according to your python version.
virtualenv --system-site-packages targetDirectory # for Python 2.7
virtualenv --system-site-packages -p python3 targetDirectory # for Python 3.n
Also, please try these links,
#2554
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5904319/problem-with-virtualenv-in-mac-os-x
body_text:
Hi,
I guess you have to choose either of the following according to your python version.
virtualenv --system-site-packages targetDirectory # for Python 2.7
virtualenv --system-site-packages -p python3 targetDirectory # for Python 3.n
Also, please try these links,
#2554
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5904319/problem-with-virtualenv-in-mac-os-x
body:
Hi,
     I guess you have to choose either of the following according to your python version.
     `virtualenv --system-site-packages targetDirectory # for Python 2.7`
     `virtualenv --system-site-packages -p python3 targetDirectory # for Python 3.n`
    Also, please try these links,
[https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2554](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2554)
[https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5904319/problem-with-virtualenv-in-mac-os-x](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5904319/problem-with-virtualenv-in-mac-os-x)
